Sprouts

The fun pencil-and-paper game
By Atticus Kuhn
Published 8/13/2020
Tags: sprouts, john conway, game, fun

sprouts is a game invented by the mathematician John Conway. In the game, there are seeds, and lines connected between them. I decided to program this game.
